meanings.definition: The act of rearranging letters in a word or phrase to form a new word or phrase.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the challenge of anagrammatizations during game night.
meanings.sent2: Anagrammatizations can be a fun way to exercise your brain.
meanings.sent3: The anagrammatizations at the spelling bee had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of anagrammatizations, creating new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The anagrammatizations in the puzzle book were tricky but satisfying to solve.

meanings.definition: The result of rearranging letters in a word or phrase to form a new word or phrase.
meanings.sent2: After some anagrammatizations, the word 'triangle' became 'integral'.
meanings.sent3: The anagrammatizations of the password made it impossible to remember.
meanings.sent4: His anagrammatizations turned chaos into order in the word jumble.
meanings.sent5: The anagrammatizations of the anagram expert were always impressive.
